text: Camilla Eve Brady (born 24 December 1993) is a British actress best known for her role in The Last Kingdom. She was said to star in the TV adaptation of The Clan of the Cave Bear which seems cancelled for now. She was also noticed for her role in Legend. == Acting career == Her breakthrough role was from Mr Selfridge. As per Vs. she is playing the role of "Princess Katia" in Guy Ritchie directed King Arthur: Legend of the Sword. == Personal life == In her childhood she moved around England. She attended St Mary's School Ascot from the age of 11 to 18. She currently resides in Hampstead in North London with her sister. Previously she dated One Direction singer and songwriter Harry Styles; they broke up in 2013. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" |+ Television and film roles |- ! Year ! Title !
